directions: In a large bowl, whisk together lime zest, lime juice and olive oil. Taste and season with salt and pepper.
Toss the quinoa, grapes, cucumbers, mint, parsley, scallions and avocados together with the dressing. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: Kosher salt and freshly cracked black pepper
4 scallions, white and light green parts, sliced
title: Green Grape and Avocado Quinoa Salad
